data.message:
CAN SOMEONE AT FACEBOOK GIVE ME SOME HELP, PLEASE!

I am trying to create multiple ad accounts in my Facebook business manager. I have added two payment methods with no problem. I was able to create one ad account but when I try to create another ad account I get the following message: “You have exceeded the number of allowed ad accounts for your business manager at this time. How can I add multiple ad accounts?”

I have tried to contact Facebook on the phone (they only want to sell me more ads and say there is no phone number for tech support). I have left comments with this question on Facebook's Facebook page but they don't respond. Can anyone offer any insight?

Nelson

P.S. “Carly from Facebook” responded to me in a post comment and asked for a link to my page.  This shows she doesn’t understand the question because I am having issues with the business manager platform – not a page.  She said I should be able to create up to 200 ad accounts – I can only create ONE!

replies.message: Hey Nelson. Can you send us a private message? We believe we can better assist you there. Thanks! -Sarah
